column1: Airways and lungs - Breathing difficulty (from breathing in fumes) - Rapid breathing Eyes, ears, nose, and throat - Severe pain in the throat - Severe pain or burning in the nose, eyes, ears, lips, or tongue - Throat swelling (which may also cause breathing difficulty) - Vision loss Heart and blood vessels - Low blood pressure (develops rapidly) - Collapse Stomach and intestines - Severe abdominal pain - Vomiting, possibly bloody - Burns of the food pipe (esophagus) - Blood in the stool Skin - Irritation - Burns - Holes in the skin or tissues under the skin
